original_text: What you have said in the dark will be heard in the daylight, and what you have whispered in the ear in the inner rooms will be proclaimed from the roofs.
korean_text: 이러므로 너희가 어두운 데서 말한 모든 것이 광명한 데서 들리고 너희가 골방에서 귀에 대고 말한 것이 지붕 위에서 전파되리라

sentences.original_text: What you have said in the dark
will be heard in the daylight
and what you have whispered in the ear
will be proclaimed from the roofs
